entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 60%
